idealist.title: idealist
idealist.role: Web Design, UX, UI, User Research, & Front-end Development
idealist.tech: Sketch, Marvel, HTML, CSS, Sass, PostCSS, Git, React.js
idealist.summary: Idealist.org is an international non-profit job board with a social mission to create more good in the world by helping people turn their intentions into actions. I was their Lead Web Designer for about five years.
